Dear IA-Team,

looking at JIRA and SVN I'm well aware that you guys are rea=
lly busy
with work on Heritrix 2.x, but I'm wondering what chances are to s=
ee
issue HER-1103 fixed for 1.x branch, too. (The "Fix Version/s" field
sug=
gests it will be fixed in 1.x, the tracker entry is allready marked
as fixe=
d - but nothing happened in 1.x regarding this issue so far.)

A similar qu=
estion is: are there any chances "[HER-1311] Prioritzation
refactoring: imp=
lement single privileged Frontier manager thread;
mediation queues" will be=
 backported to 1.x? Or is it even possible?
(I might give it a try myself i=
f you say it could be done within a
reasonable timeframe.)

Regards
  Olaf =
